projects.title: Their separate existence
projects.subtitle: UX DESIGN
projects.text: Their separate existence is a myth. For science, music, sport, etc, Europe uses the same vocabulary. The languages only differ in their grammar, their pronunciation and their most common words.

projects.title: Everyone realizes
projects.text: Everyone realizes why a new common language would be desirable: one could refuse to pay expensive translators. To achieve this, it would be necessary to have uniform grammar, pronunciation and more common words.

projects.title: The new common language
projects.subtitle: UX DESIGN
projects.text: The languages only differ in their grammar, their pronunciation and their most common words. Everyone realizes why a new common language would be desirable: one could refuse to pay expensive translators.
